effect.diamond_pearl: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.platinum: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
short_effect.platinum: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.
flavor_text.platinum: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.
